mapper.select: select * from conf_room_tb order by croom_size asc, croom_code
select * from car_tb order by car_cate asc, car_code

select r.croom_code "thing_code", c.croom_name "thing_name", c.croom_size "thing_size", round(r.res_returndate - r.res_usedate)*24*60 "how_long", r.res_usedate "res_use_date", r.res_returndate "res_return_date" from conf_rsvn_tb r join conf_room_tb c on r.croom_code = c.croom_code where emp_no = 1 order by r.res_usedate desc

select r.car_code "thing_code", c.car_company ||' '|| c.car_type "thing_name", c.car_size "thing_size", round(r.res_returndate - r.res_usedate)*24*60 "how_long", r.res_usedate "res_use_date", r.res_returndate "res_return_date" from car_rsvn_tb r join car_tb c on r.car_code = c.car_code where emp_no = 1 order by r.res_usedate desc
